title: Titanium tetrafluoride catalysis for the dehydrative conversion of diphenylmethanols to symmetric and unsymmetric ethers
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,24236-24239
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04712E, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Aman G. Singh, Abdulkhaliq A. Alawaed, P. Veeraraghavan Ramachandran
Catalytic titanium tetrafluoride efficiently converts benzhydrols to bisbenzhydryl ethers or cross-ethers (with primary alcohols) within 0.5–2 h, achieving high yields.
